snippet: Kevin Durant withdrew on Thursday from the United States national team, the biggest loss for a weakened American squad.
abstract: Kevin Durant withdraws from United States national basketball team, biggest loss for weakened American squad that will go to the World Cup in Spain without the leading scorer on its last two gold medal winners; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Kevin Durant withdrew on Thursday from the United States national team, the biggest loss for a weakened American squad.
